SELECT O.ORDER_KEY AS orderKey, O.ORDER_DATE AS orderDate, M.USERNAME AS userName, M.USERID AS userId, O.PRICE AS price, O.ORDER_STATUS AS orderStatus, O.CARD AS card FROM ORDER_LIST O JOIN MEMBER M ON O.USERID = M.USERID
AND O.ORDER_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
AND O.ORDER_STATUS = #{status}
AND O.ORDER_KEY LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND M.USERID LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND M.USERNAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
ORDER BY O.ORDER_DATE DESC

SELECT O.ORDER_KEY AS orderKey, O.ORDER_DATE AS orderDate, M.USERNAME AS userName, M.USERID AS userId, M.PHONE AS phone, M.EMAIL AS email, O.PRICE AS price, O.ORDER_STATUS AS orderStatus, O.CARD AS card, O.REQUEST AS request FROM ORDER_LIST O JOIN MEMBER M ON O.USERID = M.USERID WHERE O.ORDER_KEY = #{orderId}

SELECT O.ITEM_NO AS itemNo, O.ORDER_COUNT AS orderCount, P.ITEM_NAME AS itemName, O.PRICE AS price, (O.ORDER_COUNT * O.PRICE) AS itemTotal, ( SELECT FILEPATH FROM ( SELECT I.FILEPATH FROM PRODUCT_IMG I WHERE I.ITEM_NO = P.ITEM_NO ORDER BY I.ITEM_NO ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ) AS imageUrl FROM ORDER_LIST O JOIN PRODUCT P ON O.ITEM_NO = P.ITEM_NO WHERE O.ORDER_KEY = #{orderId}
